name: Watchman
description: A town guard or local police force, you enforce the law.

exploits.name: Vigilant
exploits.description: Constantly vigilant, you are hard to surprise. You gain a +1d6 die bonus to access the ambush turn.

exploits.name: Chaser
exploits.description: When chasing someone, your SPEED increases by +2.

exploits.name: Clues
exploits.description: If there are clues to be discovered at the scene of a crime, you automatically find them within 5 minutes.

exploits.name: Sap
exploits.description: You gain a special sap attack, used to knock out and apprehend criminals. You use any weapon; you do no damage, but a successful attack pushes the target along the Alertness status track by one stage for each 5 points of damage you would have done.

exploits.name: Troublesense
exploits.description: You are able to spot trouble before it happens. You gain a +1d6 bonus to INITIATIVE checks.
